name: audience_monthly_metrics
description: Aggregates campaign performance metrics monthly by company and target audience. Provides insights into audience-specific trends, month-over-month changes, spend, revenue, and efficiency over time. Designed for dashboarding audience ROI and performance trends.

columns.name: Company
columns.description: The name of the company associated with the campaign data. Primary dimension for aggregation.

columns.name: Target_Audience
columns.description: The specific audience segment targeted by the campaigns. Secondary dimension for aggregation.

columns.name: month
columns.description: The calendar month (1-12) extracted from the campaign date, used for monthly aggregation.

columns.name: campaign_count
columns.description: The total number of campaigns run for the specific company, target audience, and month.

columns.name: avg_conversion_rate
columns.description: The average conversion rate across all campaigns for the specific company, target audience, and month. Calculated as the average of individual campaign Conversion_Rate values.

columns.name: avg_roi
columns.description: The average Return on Investment (ROI) across all campaigns for the specific company, target audience, and month. Calculated as the average of individual campaign ROI values.

columns.name: avg_acquisition_cost
columns.description: The average cost to acquire a customer (Acquisition Cost) across all campaigns for the specific company, target audience, and month. Calculated as the average of individual campaign Acquisition_Cost values.

columns.name: monthly_ctr
columns.description: The overall Click-Through Rate (CTR) for the specific company, target audience, and month. Calculated as SUM(Clicks) / SUM(Impressions).

columns.name: total_clicks
columns.description: The total number of clicks accumulated across all campaigns for the specific company, target audience, and month.

columns.name: total_impressions
columns.description: The total number of impressions accumulated across all campaigns for the specific company, target audience, and month.

columns.name: total_spend
columns.description: The estimated total spend for the specific company, target audience, and month. Calculated as SUM(Clicks * Acquisition_Cost).

columns.name: total_revenue
columns.description: The estimated total revenue generated for the specific company, target audience, and month. Calculated as SUM(Clicks * Acquisition_Cost * ROI).

columns.name: roi_vs_prev_month
columns.description: The percentage change in average ROI compared to the previous month for the same company and target audience. NULL for the earliest month in the data.

columns.name: conversion_rate_vs_prev_month
columns.description: The percentage change in average conversion rate compared to the previous month for the same company and target audience. NULL for the earliest month in the data.

columns.name: acquisition_cost_vs_prev_month
columns.description: The percentage change in average acquisition cost compared to the previous month for the same company and target audience (positive value indicates improvement/lower cost). NULL for the earliest month in the data.

columns.name: ctr_vs_prev_month
columns.description: The percentage change in monthly CTR compared to the previous month for the same company and target audience. NULL for the earliest month in the data.

columns.name: audience_count
columns.description: The total number of distinct target audiences active within the specific company during that month.

columns.name: audience_share_clicks
columns.description: The proportion of total clicks within the company for that month that came from this specific target audience. Calculated as SUM(Clicks for this Audience) / SUM(Total Clicks for Company).

columns.name: response_rate
columns.description: The rate at which impressions turned into clicks for this company, audience, and month. Calculated as total_clicks / total_impressions.

columns.name: efficiency_ratio
columns.description: A measure of efficiency, calculated as total_revenue / total_spend for this company, audience, and month. Represents revenue generated per dollar spent (similar to ROAS).
